attributes.action: Gas, Electric, and Water Companies should be run by Cooperatives.
attributes.additional_details:
We petition the government to promote, invest, and develop cooperatives to compete and run our Utility Companies. The benefits would mean, fairer prices, transparency, and a customer driven policy.

UK consumers are tired of profiteering cartels who exploit the needs of users. A cooperative will more fairly regulate prices and investment.

Consumers, who would be shareholders, benefit directly from the fortunes of the corporative.
